summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2251, for the improvement of the Northeast 40 feet of Ravenna Boulevard between Woodlawn Avenue and the angle point near 9th Avenue Northeast, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and constructing the necessary appurtenances for the proper surface and sub-drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 23088 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
